image.altText: Caboolture plane crash

items.synopsis: A man and a woman have died after a collision between two aircraft at Caboolture Airfield.

title.children: Man and woman in their 60s killed as planes collide north of Brisbane

image.altText: An aerial view of streets in suburban Melbourne, on a sunny day.

items.synopsis: Some suburbs are now seeing as much as a 14.4 per cent growth in median house value.

title.children: Some Australian suburbs are experiencing another property market boom. Is yours one of them?

image.altText: Shane Tuck breaking past Ben Warren carrying an AFL ball.

items.synopsis: Richmond footy player Shane Tuck "pushed through hell"Â with a brain injury, his sister tells an inquest. Meanwhile the AFL says a protective helmet is still in the concept phase.

title.children: AFL player Shane Tuck 'pushed through hell', his sister tells inquest

image.altText: Two female football players, wearin white with blue shorts, running and celebrating.

items.synopsis: England and Denmark won their opening Group D matches and face off at the Sydney Football Stadium this evening.

title.children: England strike early with long range goal against Denmark

liveBlogPostPrepared.plaintext: This doesn't look good. Number 4 Keira Walsh slid to make an interception and immediately grabbed her knee. She alerted the ref she was in trouble, and the match was halted. She gestured to the bench that her night is done. Let's hope it's not a serious injury, but she has been taken off in a stretcher with a brace around her right leg.
liveBlogPostPrepared.title: 35': Stoppage for the injury to England's Keira Walsh

children.content: Keira Walsh slid to make an interception and immediately grabbed her knee.

props.alt: Medics gather around a female footballer who is injured and sitting on a stretcher

children.content: She alerted the ref she was in trouble, and the match was halted.
She gestured to the bench that her night is done.
Let's hope it's not a serious injury, but she has been taken off in a stretcher with a brace around her right leg.

liveBlogPostPrepared.plaintext: Denmark have started to threaten the English Goal. Janni Thomsen and Pernille Harder both had good chances, but could not convert.
liveBlogPostPrepared.title: 30': Denmark starting to make progress

children.content: Denmark have started to threaten the English Goal.
Pernille Harder both had good chances, but could not convert.

liveBlogPostPrepared.plaintext: What a strike from Lauren James. England had been assertive in the opening minutes. James gets the ball 30-odd metres out from goal. Two touches and then she goes WHACK from outside the box. Denmark keeper Lene Christensen dived to her left but had no chance.
liveBlogPostPrepared.title: 6': GOAL ENGLAND

children.content: What a strike from Lauren James.
England had been assertive in the opening minutes.
James gets the ball 30-odd metres out from goal.
Two touches and then she goes WHACK from outside the box.
Denmark keeper Lene Christensen dived to her left but had no chance.
